TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PictureBox extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class PictureBox Inherits Control Implements ISupportInitialize
type PictureBox = class inherit Control interface ISupportInitialize
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PictureBox extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示用于显示图像的 Windows 图片框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows picture box control for displaying an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常 用于显示位图、图元文件、图标、JPEG、GIF 或 PNG 文件中的图形。Typically the is used to display graphics from a bitmap, metafile, icon, JPEG, GIF, or PNG file. 在设计时或运行时，将属性设置为要显示的。Set the property to the you want to display, either at design time or at run time. 还可以通过设置属性来指定映像 ，并使用方法以异步方式加载图像， 或使用方法以异步方式加载图像 。You can alternatively specify the image by setting the property and load the image synchronously using the method or asynchronously using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果要在多个控件中使用同一图像 ，请为每个控件创建映像的副本 。If you want to use the same image in multiple controls, create a clone of the image for each . 从多个控件访问相同的图像会导致发生异常。Accessing the same image from multiple controls causes an exception to occur. 设置为枚举中的值的属性 控制图像在显示区域中的剪辑和位置。The property, which is set to values in the enumeration, controls the clipping and positioning of the image in the display area. 可以在运行时通过属性更改显示区域的大小 。You can change the size of the display area at run time with the property. 默认情况下， 控件显示时不带任何边框。By default, the control is displayed by without any borders. 您可以使用属性提供标准或三维边框 来区分图片框和窗体的其余部分，即使它不包含图像。You can provide a standard or three-dimensional border using the property to distinguish the picture box from the rest of the form, even if it contains no image. 不 是可选择的控件，这意味着它不能接收输入焦点。The is not a selectable control, which means that it cannot receive input focus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置图像和调整图片框的显示区域大小。The following code example illustrates how you can set an image and resize the display area of the picture box. 此示例要求 `ShowMyImage` 在现有窗体中调用，并且已将该 命名空间添加到窗体的源代码中。This example requires that `ShowMyImage` is called in an existing form, and that the namespace has been added to the source code for your form. [!code-cpp[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Images, Bitmaps, and Metafiles

related.span: 使用图像、位图、图标和图元文件

span.span: Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |项Item|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| ||`null`| ||| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 通过 分别使用和枚举设置和属性来初始化 。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 填充了 " 示例图片" 目录中的图片。The is populated with pictures from the Sample Pictures directory. 处理控件的事件时，将使用方法 来确定是否选择了某个项。The method is used when handling the event of the control to determine whether an item is selected. 如果选择了某个项，则该事件处理程序会通过设置属性来显示选定的文件 。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 该示例要求 C:\documents and 和 Settings\All Users\Documents\My 收藏 \ 示例 Pictures 目录中包含 JPG 文件。The example requires that you have JPG files located in the C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要运行该示例，请将代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializePictureBox` `PopulateListView` 在窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法中调用和方法 。To run the example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or event-handling method. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在设计时或运行时指定此属性。You can specify this property at design time or run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 通过 分别使用和枚举设置和属性来初始化 。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 填充了 " 示例图片" 目录中的图片。The is populated with pictures from the Sample Pictures directory. 当处理控件的事件时，将使用方法 来确定是否选择了某个项。The method is used in when handling the event of the control to determine whether an item is selected. 如果选择了某个项，则该事件处理程序会通过设置属性来显示选定的文件 。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 该示例要求 C:\documents and 和 Settings\All Users\Documents\My 收藏 \ 示例 Pictures 目录中包含 JPG 文件。The example requires that you have JPG files located in the C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializePictureBox` `PopulateListView` 在窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法中调用和方法 。To run this example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or event-handling method. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 取消异步图像加载。

span.span: Cancels an asynchronous image load.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性为时，将异步加载图像 `false` ， 使用方法来加载图像。A image is loaded asynchronously when the property is `false` and the method is used to load the image. 如果使用方法取消来取消负载， 则会通过 使用 设置为的属性引发事件来报告 `true` 。If a load is canceled with the method cancellation is reported by raising the event with the property of the set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为和 的 `pictureBox1` 两个 控件的 `startLoadButton` Windows 窗体中 `cancelLoadButton` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and two controls named `startLoadButton` and `cancelLoadButton`. 请确保按钮的 事件与其在此示例中的事件处理方法相关联。Make sure that the event for the buttons is associated with their event-handling method in this example. 您必须将图像文件路径更改为系统上的有效路径。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 则释放托管资源和非托管资源；为 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release managed and unmanaged resources; to release unmanaged resources only.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置由 显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed by .
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为要显示的 。The property is set to the to display. 可以在设计时或运行时执行此操作。You can do this either at design time or at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果要在多个控件中使用同一图像 ，请为每个控件创建映像的副本 。If you want to use the same image in multiple controls, create a clone of the image for each . 从多个控件访问相同的图像会导致发生异常。Accessing the same image from multiple controls causes an exception to occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在运行时创建位图并通过设置属性将其显示在中 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a bitmap at runtime and display it in a by setting the property. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `CreateBitmapAtRuntime` 从窗体的构造函数调用。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form and call `CreateBitmapAtRuntime` from the form's constructor. summary.span: 获取或设置要在 中显示的图像的路径或 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the path or URL for the image to display in the .

value.span: 要在 中显示的图像的路径或 URL。

span.span: The path or URL for the image to display in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值可以是实际路径 (例如 "C:\SomeFolder\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg" ) 、相对路径 ( "\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg" ) 或 `http://contoso.com/images/Picture.jpg` () 的 URL。The property value can be an actual path (for example, "C:\SomeFolder\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg"), a relative path ("\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg"), or a URL (`http://contoso.com/images/Picture.jpg`). 如果使用相对路径，则会将其视为相对于工作目录。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 对方法的调用 将覆盖 属性，并将设置 为方法调用中指定的 URL 值。A call to the method will overwrite the property, setting to the URL value specified in the method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `url` 参数指示本地文件，则建议的格式为本地文件路径。If the `url` parameter indicates a local file, the recommended format is a local file path. 例如，名为 myPicture.jpg的图像文件位于 atc： \通过传递参数 **c:\myPicture.jpg** 来访问 `url` 。For example, an image file named myPicture.jpglocated atc:\ would be accessed by passing **c:\myPicture.jpg** for the `url` parameter. 可以使用完整路径（如 `http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg` ），也可以使用相对路径（如 **/images/image.jpg**）。A full path, such as `http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg`, or a relative path, such as **./images/image.jpg**, can be used. 如果使用相对路径，则会将其视为相对于工作目录。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 调用 方法可将 属性设置为的值 `url` 。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`.

span.span: is or an empty string.

exception.span: 引用无法访问的 Web 上的图像。

span.span: refers to an image on the Web that cannot be accessed.
refers to a file that is not an image.
refers to a file that does not exist.

summary.span: 异步加载图像。

span.span: Loads the image asynchronously.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 异步加载图像。

span.span: Loads the image asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了调用 方法，必须将 属性设置为， `false` 以便以异步方式加载图像。Besides calling the method, the property must be set to `false` to load an image asynchronously. 异步加载图像时，可以处理 事件以确定图像加载的进度，或使用 事件确定图像加载完成的时间。When you load an image asynchronously, you can handle the event to determine the progress of an image load or the event to determine when an image load has completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync(string url) cil managed

param.name: url
param.span: 要在 中显示的图像的路径。

span.span: The path for the image to display in the .

summary.span: 异步加载位于指定位置的图像。

span.span: Loads the image at the specified location, asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `url` 参数指示本地文件，则建议的格式为本地文件路径。If the `url` parameter indicates a local file, the recommended format is a local file path. 例如，名为 myPicture.jpg的图像文件位于 atc： \通过传递参数 **c:\myPicture.jpg** 来访问 `url` 。For example, an image file named myPicture.jpglocated atc:\ would be accessed by passing **c:\myPicture.jpg** for the `url` parameter. 可以使用完整路径（如 `http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg` ），也可以使用相对路径（如 **/images/image.jpg**）。A full path, such as `http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg`, or a relative path, such as **./images/image.jpg**, can be used. 如果使用相对路径，则会将其视为相对于工作目录。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 调用 方法可将 属性设置为的值 `url` 。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`. 调用 方法可将 属性设置为的值 `url` 。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`. 除了调用 方法外，还必须将 属性设置为， `false` 以便以异步方式加载图像。Besides calling the method, you must set the property to `false` to load an image asynchronously. 异步加载图像时，可以处理 事件以确定图像加载的进度，或使用 事件确定图像加载完成的时间。When you load an image asynchronously, you can handle the event to determine the progress of an image load or the event to determine when an image load has completed. 如果在异步图像加载操作期间发生错误，则将通过的属性捕获并报告该错误 。If an error occurs during an asynchronous image-loading operation, it will be caught and reported by the property of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的 `pictureBox1` 和名为的的 Windows 窗体中 `startLoadButton` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and a named `startLoadButton`. 请确保按钮的 事件与 `startLoadButton_Click` 此示例中的方法相关联。Make sure that the event for the button is associated with the `startLoadButton_Click` method in this example. 您必须将图像文件路径更改为系统上的有效路径。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadCompleted As AsyncCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 在异步图像加载操作完成、取消或引发异常时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the asynchronous image-load operation is completed, been canceled, or raised an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当使用其中一种方法异步加载图像时才会发生 ，并且 为 `false` 。The occurs only when the image is loaded asynchronously by using one of the methods, and is `false`. 如果通过调用方法取消图像加载，则 的属性 将设置为 `true` 。If the image-load is canceled by calling the method the property of the will be set to `true`. 如果在加载过程中发生异常或错误，将捕获该异常或错误，并且 的属性 将包含异常信息。If an exception or error occurs during the load process, it will be caught and the property of the will contain the exception information. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `PictureBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PictureBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#516](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#516)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#516](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#516)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadProgressChanged As ProgressChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 在异步图像加载操作的进度更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the progress of an asynchronous image-loading operation has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当使用其中一种方法异步加载图像时才会发生 。The occurs only when the image is loaded asynchronously by using one of the methods. 将用的属性报告映像加载的进度百分比 。The progress percentage of the image load is reported with the property of the . 如果要在或类似的控件中反映异步图像加载操作的进度，请处理 。Handle the if you want to reflect the progress of an asynchronous image-loading operation in a or similar control. 使用 的属性 来更新进度值。Use the property of the to update the progress value. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个 Windows 窗体中，其中包含名为的、一个名为的 `pictureBox1` 和一个名为 `startLoadButton` 的 `progressBar1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1`, a named `startLoadButton`, and a named `progressBar1`. 请确保 `startLoadButton_Click` 方法与 按钮的事件关联，并且 `pictureBox1_LoadProgressChanged` 方法与的 事件关联 `pictureBox1` 。Make sure that the `startLoadButton_Click` method is associated with the event for the button and the `pictureBox1_LoadProgressChanged` method is associated with the event for `pictureBox1`. 您必须将图像文件路径更改为系统上的有效路径。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 指示如何显示图像。

span.span: Indicates how the image is displayed.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的有效值取自 枚举。Valid values for this property are taken from the enumeration. 默认情况下，在 模式下，将 定位在的左上角 ，并且对于太大的图像的任何部分 将被剪裁掉。By default, in mode, the is positioned in the upper-left corner of the , and any part of the image that is too big for the is clipped. 使用 值会使图像拉伸或收缩，以适合 。Using the value causes the image to stretch or shrink to fit the . 使用 值会导致对图像进行拉伸或收缩，使其适合 。但是，会保留原始的纵横比。Using the value causes the image to be stretched or shrunk to fit the ; however, the aspect ratio in the original is maintained. 使用 值将导致控件调整到始终适合图像大小。Using the value causes the control to resize to always fit the image. 使用 值会使图像在工作区中居中。Using the value causes the image to be centered in the client area. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` 从窗体的构造函数或负载事件处理方法调用方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` method from the form's constructor or Load-event handling method. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示图像是否是同步加载的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an image is loaded synchronously.

value.span: 如果图像加载操作是同步完成的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an image-loading operation is completed synchronously; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为，则 `true` 表示以同步方式加载图像。Setting the property to `true` means the image is loaded synchronously. 这会导致用户界面阻止其他输入，直到加载该图像。This causes the user interface to be blocked from other input until the image is loaded. 当 `false` (默认) 并且 方法用于加载图像时，在加载 指定的图像时将显示图像，用户可以在加载过程中与该接口进行交互。When is `false` (the default) and the method is used to load the image, the image is displayed when the specified image is loaded, and the user can interact with the interface during the load process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的 `pictureBox1` 和名为的的 Windows 窗体中 `startLoadButton` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and a named `startLoadButton`. 请确保按钮的 事件与 `startLoadButton_Click` 此示例中的方法相关联。Make sure that the event for the button is associated with the `startLoadButton_Click` method in this example. 您必须将图像文件路径更改为在您的系统中有效的路径。You must change the image file path to one that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)]
